content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Good, thanks for asking. I'm a bit tired, but I'm excited for the day ahead.
I'm going to be teaching my students about the history of video games. It's a topic that I'm passionate about, so I'm excited to share it with them.
That sounds really interesting! I've always been a bit of a gamer myself.
Oh, cool! What's your favorite game?
I'm a big fan of the Elder Scrolls series. I love the way that the games allow you to explore a vast and open world.
I've heard good things about those games. I've been meaning to try them out.
You should! They're a lot of fun.
I will definitely check them out.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I mostly play action-adventure games, but I also enjoy playing puzzle games and platformers.
Cool, I like those types of games too.
It's good to know that we have something in common.
Maybe we can play a game together sometime.
Great, I'll send you my gamer tag.
